articles.title: Intel shares sink with 15% of workforce getting axed, suspends dividend - Fox Business
articles.description: Intel CEO says he misjudged the boom that has created a windfall for chipmakers such as Nvidia, that are leading the AI race for next generation technology.
articles.content:
Intel stock hit the skids after announcing it will slash nearly 17,000 workers and pause its dividend as part of a sweeping cost-cutting plan.
